flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3210>>3210 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3210-1200=<<3210-1200=2010>>2010 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 3210. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
